title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, heat a large skillet over medium heat and cook pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheese, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the spice blend for at least 30 minutes.
Heat butter in a large pan and cook marinated chicken until golden.
Remove chicken and set aside.
In the same pan, cook onion and garlic until softened.
Add remaining spices and cook for 1 minute.
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and return chicken to the pan.
Simmer for 5 more minutes and garnish with cilantro.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies that are crispy on the outside and chewy on the inside.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, cream together butter and both sugars until fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla.
Gradually blend in flour mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before removing.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh and crispy Caesar salad with homemade dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, and Worcestershire sauce.
Season dressing with salt and pepper to taste.
In a large bowl, toss lettuce with dressing.
Add half the Parmesan cheese and toss again.
Top with croutons and remaining Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately.
